verses.verse: הֲיָדַ֗עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> Knowest עֵ֭ת <S%H6256><s%> thou the time לֶ֣דֶת <S%H3205><s%> bring forth יַעֲלֵי־ <S%H3277><s%> when the wild goats סָ֑לַע <S%H5553><s%> of the rock חֹלֵ֖ל <S%H2342><s%> do calve אַיָּל֣וֹת <S%H355><s%> when the hinds תִּשְׁמֹֽר׃ <S%H8104><s%> ? [or] canst thou mark

תִּסְפֹּ֣ר <S%H5608><s%> Canst thou number יְרָחִ֣ים <S%H3391><s%> the months תְּמַלֶּ֑אנָה <S%H4390><s%> [that] they fulfil וְ֝יָדַ֗עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> ? or knowest עֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> thou the time לִדְתָּֽנָה׃ <S%H3205><s%> when they bring forth

תִּ֭כְרַעְנָה <S%H3766><s%> They bow יַלְדֵיהֶ֣ן <S%H3206><s%> their young ones תְּפַלַּ֑חְנָה <S%H6398><s%> themselves they bring forth חֶבְלֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H2256><s%> their sorrows תְּשַׁלַּֽחְנָה׃ <S%H7971><s%> they cast out

יַחְלְמ֣וּ <S%H2492><s%> are in good liking בְ֭נֵיהֶם <S%H1121><s%> Their young ones יִרְבּ֣וּ <S%H7235><s%> they grow up בַבָּ֑ר <S%H1250><s%> with corn יָ֝צְא֗וּ <S%H3318><s%> they go forth וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁ֥בוּ <S%H7725><s%> and return לָֽמוֹ׃

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who שִׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> Who hath sent out פֶּ֣רֶא <S%H6501><s%> the wild ass חָפְשִׁ֑י <S%H2670><s%> free וּמֹסְר֥וֹת <S%H4147><s%> the bands עָ֝ר֗וֹד <S%H6171><s%> of the swift מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who פִתֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H6605><s%> loosed

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> to whom שַׂ֣מְתִּי <S%H7760><s%> I have made עֲרָבָ֣ה <S%H6160><s%> the wilderness בֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> Whose house וּֽמִשְׁכְּנוֹתָ֥יו <S%H4908><s%> land his dwellings מְלֵֽחָה׃ <S%H4420><s%> and the barren

יִ֭שְׂחַק <S%H7832><s%> He scorneth לַהֲמ֣וֹן <S%H1995><s%> the multitude קִרְיָ֑ה <S%H7151><s%> of the city תְּשֻׁא֥וֹת <S%H8663><s%> he the crying נ֝וֹגֵ֗שׂ <S%H5065><s%> of the driver לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יִשְׁמָֽע׃ <S%H8085><s%> neither regardeth

יְת֣וּר <S%H3491><s%> The range הָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains מִרְעֵ֑הוּ <S%H4829><s%> [is] his pasture וְאַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> after כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every יָר֣וֹק <S%H3387><s%> every green thing יִדְרֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H1875><s%> and he searcheth

הֲיֹ֣אבֶה <S%H14><s%> be willing רֵּ֣ים <S%H7214><s%> Will the unicorn עָבְדֶ֑ךָ <S%H5647><s%> to serve אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Or יָ֝לִ֗ין <S%H3885><s%> thee or abide עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אֲבוּסֶֽךָ׃ <S%H18><s%> crib

הֲ‍ֽתִקְשָׁר־ <S%H7194><s%> Canst thou bind רֵ֭ים <S%H7214><s%> the unicorn בְּתֶ֣לֶם <S%H8525><s%> A furrow עֲבֹת֑וֹ <S%H5688><s%> with his band אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Or יְשַׂדֵּ֖ד <S%H7702><s%> harrow עֲמָקִ֣ים <S%H6010><s%> the valleys אַחֲרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H310><s%> after

הֲֽתִבְטַח־ <S%H982><s%> Wilt thou trust בּ֭וֹ כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because רַ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> is great כֹּח֑וֹ <S%H3581><s%> him because his strength וְתַעֲזֹ֖ב <S%H5800><s%> and leave אֵלָ֣יו <S%H413><s%> about יְגִיעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3018><s%> thy labour

הֲתַאֲמִ֣ין <S%H539><s%> Wilt thou believe בּ֭וֹ כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for [יָשׁוּב כ] (יָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> break ק) זַרְעֶ֑ךָ <S%H2233><s%> thy seed וְֽגָרְנְךָ֥ <S%H1637><s%> your threshing יֶאֱסֹֽף׃ <S%H622><s%> and gather

כְּנַף־ <S%H3671><s%> wings רְנָנִ֥ים <S%H7443><s%> [Gavest thou] the goodly נֶעֱלָ֑סָה <S%H5965><s%> unto the peacocks אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אֶ֝בְרָ֗ה <S%H84><s%> ? or wings חֲסִידָ֥ה <S%H2624><s%> and feathers וְנֹצָֽה׃ <S%H5133><s%> and plumage

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תַעֲזֹ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> Which leaveth לָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth בֵּצֶ֑יהָ <S%H1000><s%> her eggs וְֽעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in עָפָ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> them in dust תְּחַמֵּֽם׃ <S%H2552><s%> and warmeth

וַ֭תִּשְׁכַּח <S%H7911><s%> And forgetteth כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that רֶ֣גֶל <S%H7272><s%> that the foot תְּזוּרֶ֑הָ <S%H2115><s%> may crush וְחַיַּ֖ת <S%H2416><s%> beast הַשָּׂדֶ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> them or that the wild תְּדוּשֶֽׁהָ׃ <S%H1758><s%> may break

הִקְשִׁ֣יחַ <S%H7188><s%> She is hardened בָּנֶ֣יהָ <S%H1121><s%> against her young ones לְּלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> as though [they were] not לָ֑הּ לְרִ֖יק <S%H7385><s%> is in vain יְגִיעָ֣הּ <S%H3018><s%> hers her labour בְּלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> without פָֽחַד׃ <S%H6343><s%> without fear

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because הִשָּׁ֣הּ <S%H5382><s%> hath deprived אֱל֣וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> Because God חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> her of wisdom וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not חָ֥לַק <S%H2505><s%> neither hath he imparted לָ֝֗הּ בַּבִּינָֽה׃ <S%H998><s%> to her understanding

כָּ֭עֵת <S%H6256><s%> What time בַּמָּר֣וֹם <S%H4791><s%> herself on high תַּמְרִ֑יא <S%H4754><s%> she lifteth up תִּֽשְׂחַ֥ק <S%H7832><s%> she scorneth לַ֝סּ֗וּס <S%H5483><s%> the horse וּלְרֹֽכְבֽוֹ׃ <S%H7392><s%> and his rider

הֲתִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> Hast thou given לַסּ֣וּס <S%H5483><s%> the horse גְּבוּרָ֑ה <S%H1369><s%> force הֲתַלְבִּ֖ישׁ <S%H3847><s%> apparel צַוָּאר֣וֹ <S%H6677><s%> his neck רַעְמָֽה׃ <S%H7483><s%> thunder
הְֽ֭תַרְעִישֶׁנּוּ <S%H7493><s%> Canst thou make him afraid כָּאַרְבֶּ֑ה <S%H697><s%> grasshopper ה֖וֹד <S%H1935><s%> beauty נַחְר֣וֹ <S%H5170><s%> of his nostrils אֵימָֽה׃ <S%H367><s%> [is] terrible

יַחְפְּר֣וּ <S%H2658><s%> He paweth בָ֭עֵמֶק <S%H6010><s%> in the valley וְיָשִׂ֣ישׂ <S%H7797><s%> and rejoiceth בְּכֹ֑חַ <S%H3581><s%> in [his] strength יֵ֝צֵ֗א <S%H3318><s%> he goeth on לִקְרַאת־ <S%H7125><s%> to meet נָֽשֶׁק׃ <S%H5402><s%> the armed men

יִשְׂחַ֣ק <S%H7832><s%> He mocketh לְ֭פַחַד <S%H6343><s%> at fear וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵחָ֑ת <S%H2865><s%> and is not affrighted וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יָ֝שׁ֗וּב <S%H7725><s%> neither turneth he back מִפְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> from חָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> the sword

עָ֭לָיו <S%H5921><s%> against תִּרְנֶ֣ה <S%H7439><s%> rattleth אַשְׁפָּ֑ה <S%H827><s%> The quiver לַ֖הַב <S%H3851><s%> against him the glittering חֲנִ֣ית <S%H2595><s%> spear וְכִידֽוֹן׃ <S%H3591><s%> and the shield

בְּרַ֣עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> with fierceness וְ֭רֹגֶז <S%H7267><s%> and rage יְגַמֶּא־ <S%H1572><s%> He swalloweth אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the ground וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יַ֝אֲמִ֗ין <S%H539><s%> neither believeth כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> at ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> he that [it is] the sound שׁוֹפָֽר׃ <S%H7782><s%> of the trumpet

בְּדֵ֤י <S%H1767><s%> among שֹׁפָ֨ר ׀ <S%H7782><s%> the trumpets יֹ֘אמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> He saith הֶאָ֗ח <S%H1889><s%> Ha וּֽ֭מֵרָחוֹק <S%H7350><s%> afar off יָרִ֣יחַ <S%H7306><s%> and he smelleth מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> the battle רַ֥עַם <S%H7482><s%> the thunder שָׂ֝רִים <S%H8269><s%> of the captains וּתְרוּעָֽה׃ <S%H8643><s%> and the shouting

הֲ‍ֽ֭מִבִּינָ֣תְךָ <S%H998><s%> by thy wisdom יַֽאֲבֶר־ <S%H82><s%> fly נֵ֑ץ <S%H5322><s%> Doth the hawk יִפְרֹ֖שׂ <S%H6566><s%> [and] stretch [כְּנָפֹו כ] (כְּנָפָ֣יו <S%H3671><s%> bird ק) לְתֵימָֽן׃ <S%H8486><s%> south side אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at
פִּ֭יךָ <S%H6310><s%> at thy command יַגְבִּ֣יהַּ <S%H1361><s%> mount up נָ֑שֶׁר <S%H5404><s%> Doth the eagle וְ֝כִ֗י <S%H3588><s%> for יָרִ֥ים <S%H7311><s%> on high קִנּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7064><s%> her nest

סֶ֣לַע <S%H5553><s%> on the rock יִ֭שְׁכֹּן <S%H7931><s%> She dwelleth וְיִתְלֹנָ֑ן <S%H3885><s%> and abideth עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שֶׁן־ <S%H8127><s%> upon the crag סֶ֝֗לַע <S%H5553><s%> of the rock וּמְצוּדָֽה׃ <S%H4686><s%> and the strong place

מִשָּׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there חָֽפַר־ <S%H2658><s%> From thence she seeketh אֹ֑כֶל <S%H400><s%> the prey לְ֝מֵרָח֗וֹק <S%H7350><s%> afar off עֵינָ֥יו <S%H5869><s%> [and] her eyes יַבִּֽיטוּ׃ <S%H5027><s%> behold

[וְאֶפְרֹחֹו כ] (וְאֶפְרֹחָ֥יו <S%H667><s%> young ק) יְעַלְעוּ־ <S%H5966><s%> also suck up דָ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> blood וּבַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> and where חֲ֝לָלִ֗ים <S%H2491><s%> and where the slain שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> are there הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> [are] there [is] she פ
